Class RightToLeft

java.lang.Object
RightToLeft
Direct Known Subclasses:
Weapon
public class RightToLeft extends Object
Class that wraps all methods for object that move from right to left on the screen

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor
    Description
    RightToLeft​(bagel.Image image, bagel.util.Point position)
    Constructor for objects that move from right to left with no draw options (stand upright)
    RightToLeft​(bagel.Image image, bagel.util.Point position, bagel.DrawOptions options)
    Constructor for objects that move from right to left with specified draw option variation

      position - Initial position of the object

    • RightToLeft

      public RightToLeft​(bagel.Image image, bagel.util.Point position, bagel.DrawOptions options)
      Constructor for objects that move from right to left with specified draw option variation
      Parameters:
      image - Image of the object
      position - Initial position of the object
      options - The draw options applied to the object for rendering

      Check if the object has passed the bird on screen
      Parameters:
      bird - The bird in play
      Returns:
      Returns true if object has passed the bird

    • checkWindowBounds

      public boolean checkWindowBounds()
      Check if object has gone out of window bounds
